trans-unit.source: Provides utility methods and commands to create and delete highlight, ink sticky note, and text sticky note annotations.
trans-unit.target: 提供实用工具方法和命令，以创建和删除突出显示的墨迹粘滞便笺及文本粘滞便笺批注。

trans-unit.source: The annotation service from which to remove highlight annotations.
trans-unit.target: 从中移除突出显示批注的批注服务。

trans-unit.source: Clears all highlight annotations from the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: 从与给定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> 相关联的查看器控件的当前所选内容中清除所有突出显示批注。

trans-unit.source: If the current viewer selection is zero length or does not overlap any annotation highlights, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.ClearHighlightsForSelection%2A> performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的查看器所选内容的长度为零或不重叠任何批注突出显示，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.ClearHighlightsForSelection%2A>不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If the current viewer selection overlaps a highlight only partially, only the portion of the selection that overlaps is cleared and the unselected portion of the annotation highlight remains.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的查看器所选内容仅部分重叠突出显示，清除仅重叠所选内容的一部分，并且未选取的批注突出显示部分保持。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未启用 <paramref name="service" />。

trans-unit.source: The annotation service to use to create the highlight annotation.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建突出显示批注的批注服务。

trans-unit.source: The author of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 批注的作者。

trans-unit.source: The brush to use to draw the highlight over the selected content.
trans-unit.target: 用于对所选内容绘制突出显示的画笔。

trans-unit.source: Creates a highlight annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: 在与指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> 相关联的查看器控件的当前所选内容上创建突出显示批注。

trans-unit.source: The highlight annotation; or <see langword="null" />, if there is no selected content to highlight.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示批注；如果不存在要突出显示的所选内容，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The highlight annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> control specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示批注定位到定义当前选择的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>到指定控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If there is no selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有选定的内容 （所选内容长度为零长度），会创建任何批注和<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。

trans-unit.source: `author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined.
trans-unit.target: `author` 可以指定为`null`在这种情况下不定义作者。

trans-unit.source: If `highlightBrush` is `null`, the default highlight brush of the given annotation `service` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`highlightBrush`是`null`，默认值突出显示的给定批注画笔`service`使用。

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateHighlightForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 给定的批注`service`必须通过调用启用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateHighlightForSelection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未启用 <paramref name="service" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="highlightBrush" /> in not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="highlightBrush" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />。

trans-unit.source: The viewer control contains no content selection.
trans-unit.target: 查看器控件不包含任何内容选择。

trans-unit.source: The annotation service to use to create the ink sticky note annotation.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建墨迹粘滞便笺批注的批注服务。

trans-unit.source: The author of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 批注的作者。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ink sticky note annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />..
trans-unit.target: 在与指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> 相关联的查看器控件的当前所选内容上创建墨迹粘滞便笺批注。

trans-unit.source: The ink sticky note annotation; or <see langword="null" />, if there is no selected content to annotate.
trans-unit.target: 墨迹粘滞便笺批注；如果不存在要加批注的所选内容，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The ink sticky note annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> control specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 墨迹手写便笺批注定位到定义当前选择的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>到指定控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If there is no user-selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有用户选定的内容 （所选内容长度为零长度），会创建任何批注和<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。

trans-unit.source: `author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined.
trans-unit.target: `author` 可以指定为`null`在这种情况下不定义作者。

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateInkStickyNoteForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 给定的批注`service`必须通过调用启用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateInkStickyNoteForSelection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未启用 <paramref name="service" />。

trans-unit.source: The viewer control contains no content selection.
trans-unit.target: 查看器控件不包含任何内容选择。

trans-unit.source: The annotation service to use to create the text sticky note annotation.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建文本粘滞便笺批注的批注服务。

trans-unit.source: The author of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 批注的作者。

trans-unit.source: Creates a text sticky note annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: 在与指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> 相关联的查看器控件的当前所选内容上创建文本粘滞便笺批注。

trans-unit.source: The text sticky note annotation; or <see langword="null" />, if there is no selected content to annotate.
trans-unit.target: 文本粘滞便笺批注；如果不存在要加批注的所选内容，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The text sticky note annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> control specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 文本手写便笺批注定位到定义当前选择的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>到指定控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If there is no user-selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有用户选定的内容 （所选内容长度为零长度），会创建任何批注和<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。

trans-unit.source: `author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined.
trans-unit.target: `author` 可以指定为`null`在这种情况下不定义作者。

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateTextStickyNoteForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 给定的批注`service`必须通过调用启用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateTextStickyNoteForSelection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未启用 <paramref name="service" />。

trans-unit.source: The viewer control contains no content selection.
trans-unit.target: 查看器控件不包含任何内容选择。

trans-unit.source: The annotation service from which to delete ink sticky note annotations.
trans-unit.target: 从中删除墨迹粘滞便笺批注的批注服务。

trans-unit.source: Deletes ink sticky note annotations that are wholly contained within the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: 删除完全包含在与给定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> 相关联的查看器的当前所选内容内的墨迹粘滞便笺批注。

trans-unit.source: If the viewer control associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> contains no user selection or the user selection does not wholly contain any ink sticky note annotations, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A> performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果与关联的查看器控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>不包含用户所选内容或用户选择不完全包含任何墨迹手写便笺批注，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A>不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 给定的批注`service`必须通过调用启用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未启用 <paramref name="service" />。

trans-unit.source: The annotation service from which to delete text sticky note annotations.
trans-unit.target: 从中删除文本粘滞便笺批注的批注服务。

trans-unit.source: Deletes text sticky note annotations that are wholly contained within the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: 删除完全包含在与给定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> 相关联的查看器的当前所选内容内的文本粘滞便笺批注。

trans-unit.source: If the viewer control associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> contains no user selection or the user selection does not wholly contain any text sticky note annotations, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A> performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果与关联的查看器控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>不包含用户所选内容或用户选择不完全包含的任何文本手写便笺批注，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A>不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 给定的批注`service`必须通过调用启用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未启用 <paramref name="service" />。

trans-unit.source: The annotation service to use for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要用于此操作的批注服务。

trans-unit.source: The annotation to get anchoring information for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其获取定位信息的批注。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> object that provides anchoring information, such as the anchor location, about the specified annotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> 对象，该对象提供有关指定批注的定位信息，如定位点位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> object that provides anchoring information about the specified annotation, or <see langword="null" /> if it cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> 对象，该对象提供有关指定批注的定位信息；如果无法解析指定的批注，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑具有注释窗格一个简单的文档读取器应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document.
trans-unit.target: 注释窗格可能是一个列表框，用于显示锚定到文档的批注列表的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户在列表框中选择一项，应用程序将显示相应的批注对象所锚定到的文档段落。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现充当注释窗格的此类列表框的事件处理程序。
